name: Hungry Hedgehogs
description:
CREATED FOR The Daily Click "Hi-Score Mashup " Jam 2022.

The theme of the game jam was to take characters or concepts from games in Kliktopia's Clickteam Game Demo Collection and mash them up into a brand new game. 

I chose the game "Hungry Hedgehogs," which was a very basic math game, and created a game where the hedgehogs can no longer afford food and must go to work in dangerous mathematic mines on alien planets to pay the bills.

Programming was done by me!

Music was done by Fox, Miss Crepis, 45Potato and myself.

Artwork for the intro was done by Robots and myself.
